content.text: tell me about the stiffness matrix

content: The stiffness matrix represents the relationship between the position of the robot endpoint and the reference position, simulating a virtual spring behavior. It adjusts the stiffness based on user feedback to improve the interaction between the user and the robot.

content: The stiffness matrix defines how the robot resists displacement from a target position, acting like a spring. If you need clarification on a specific aspect, please let me know!
